verses.verse: The words <S%H1697><s%> of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> who were in Anathoth <S%H6068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>

to whom the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amon, <S%H526><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> in the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign. <S%H4427><s%>

It came also in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> to the end <S%H8552><s%> of the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Zedekiah, <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> to the carrying away <S%H1540><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> captive <S%H1540><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
Now the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

"Before <S%H2962><s%> I formed <S%H3335><s%> you in the belly, <S%H990><s%> I knew <S%H3045><s%> you. <S%H3318><s%> Before you came forth out of the womb, <S%H7358><s%> I sanctified <S%H6942><s%> you. <S%H5414><s%> I have appointed you a prophet <S%H5030><s%> to the nations. <S%H1471><s%>"
Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "Ah, <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H3045><s%> I don't know how to speak; <S%H1696><s%> for I am a child. <S%H5288><s%>"

But Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> "Don't say, <S%H5288><s%> 'I am a child;' for to whoever I shall send <S%H7971><s%> you, <S%H3212><s%> you shall go, and whatever I shall command <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H1696><s%> you shall speak.
Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid because of them; <S%H6440><s%> for I am with you to deliver <S%H5337><s%> you, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> my mouth; <S%H6310><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H5414><s%> "Behold, I have put my words <S%H1697><s%> in your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have this day <S%H3117><s%> set <S%H6485><s%> you over the nations <S%H1471><s%> and over the kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> to pluck up <S%H5428><s%> and to break down <S%H5422><s%> and to destroy <S%H6><s%> and to overthrow, <S%H2040><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> and to plant. <S%H5193><s%>"

Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "300, <S%H3414><s%> what do you see? <S%H7200><s%>" I said, <S%H559><s%> "I see <S%H7200><s%> a branch <S%H4731><s%> of an almond tree. <S%H8247><s%>"
Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> "You have seen well; <S%H3190><s%> for I watch <S%H8245><s%> over my word <S%H1697><s%> to perform it. <S%H6213><s%>"

The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me the second time, <S%H8145><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What do you see? <S%H7200><s%>" I said, <S%H559><s%> "I see <S%H7200><s%> a boiling <S%H5301><s%> caldron; <S%H5518><s%> and it is tipping <S%H6440><s%> away from <S%H6440><s%> the north. <S%H6828><s%>"
Then Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H6828><s%> "Out of the north evil <S%H7451><s%> will break out <S%H6605><s%> on all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

For, <S%H7121><s%> behold, I will call all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> "and they shall come, <S%H935><s%> and they shall each <S%H376><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and against all its walls <S%H2346><s%> all around, <S%H5439><s%> and against all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

I will utter <S%H1696><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> against them touching <S%H5921><s%> all their wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> in that they have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, <S%H6999><s%> and have burned incense to other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of their own hands. <S%H3027><s%>

"You therefore put <S%H247><s%> your belt on your waist, <S%H4975><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> to them all that I command <S%H6680><s%> you. <S%H2865><s%> Don't be dismayed at them, <S%H6440><s%> lest I dismay <S%H2865><s%> you before them. <S%H6440><s%>

For, <S%H589><s%> behold, I have made <S%H5414><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> a fortified <S%H4013><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and an iron <S%H1270><s%> pillar, <S%H5982><s%> and bronze <S%H5178><s%> walls, <S%H2346><s%> against the whole land, <S%H776><s%> against the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> against its princes, <S%H8269><s%> against its priests, <S%H3548><s%> and against the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>
They will fight <S%H3898><s%> against you; <S%H3201><s%> but they will not prevail against you; <S%H5002><s%> for I am with you," says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "to deliver you. <S%H5337><s%>"
